name: Tamakushi Casket
description:
When your Sangonomiya Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses Nereid's Ascension: Summon a Bake-Kurage with a Usage(s) of 1; if Bake-Kurage is already on the field, then increase its Usage(s) by 1 instead.
While Ceremonial Garment exists, Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1205], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12053]</color>: Summon a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> with a $[K3] of 1; if <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> is already on the field, then increase its $[K3] by 1 instead.\nWhile <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112052]</color> exists, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> deals +1 DMG.
